title: Hong Kong: two people reported killed after cargo plane skids off airport runway
description: The northern runway at the airport was closed after the incident, Hong Kong International Airport said
content:
A cargo plane has skidded off the runway into the sea while landing at Hong Kong International Airport, the city’s airport operator said on Monday, with two people reportedly confirmed dead.
The northern runway at the airport was closed after the inc... [755 chars]

title: Cargo plane skids off runway into sea at Hong Kong International Airport
description: The Emirates flight reportedly hit a vehicle one the ground as it came into land at the international airport.
content:
A cargo plane has skidded off a runway at Hong Kong International Airport and landed in the sea, killing at least one person, local media have reported.
The Emirates flight, operating as Aerotranscargo, was arriving from Dubai just before 04:00 local... [351 chars]

title: Housing market slows amid fears Reeves will increase property taxes
description: Post-summer bounce in activity fails to materialise as buyers and sellers, in the south especially, opt to ‘wait and see’
content:
The UK’s housing market is showing signs of slowing down amid speculation that Rachel Reeves could announce tax increases on property in next month’s budget.
In a sign of growing caution among house hunters, figures from Rightmove showed that both th... [2866 chars]

title: L’Oréal to Acquire Kering Beauty Portfolio for $4.6 Billion
description: The companies announced on Sunday that L’Oréal will acquire Kering’s beauty brands and licenses for its fashion house names, including Gucci.
content:
L’Oréal will take over Kering’s beauty portfolio, including the prestige fragrance maker Creed it acquired in 2023 for $3.8 billion, and the rights to make beauty lines for its fashion house brands, the companies announced on Sunday.
This includes th... [2121 chars]

title: UK’s biggest pension funds back regional growth drive
description: Legal & General and the Universities Superannuation Scheme are among 20 members of a new investment partnership called Sterling 20
content:
The 20 participants also include M&G, Phoenix, Aviva, Royal London and the Universities Superannuation Scheme.
